ModulePrefs.title: YouTube
ModulePrefs.description: This plugin imports video published from any publically available YouTube user account. To configure, enter the YouTube account user name.
ModulePrefs.author: Eureka Framework

Module.Content:
<script type="text/javascript"> eurekastreams.streamplugin.addUrlValidator("User Name", "feed", "", "", "Please enter a valid YouTube user name.", "function(value) { if(value=='') { return ''; } else { return 'http://gdata.youtube.com/feeds/base/users/' + value + '/uploads?alt=rss'; }}");
eurekastreams.streamplugin.registerGetFeedCallback( "function() { return $wnd.gwt_getFormValue('feed'); }"); </script>
